text: could your TV be spying on you if you've

weeping angel named it seems after

how they've replicated the CIA's

well modern TVs are basically powerful
computers they got some processors on
there but most importantly they've got

written a little application here
screens almost blank it listens to

once the apps installed it makes it look

now I've got a microphone here that

anyone listening hi TV it is possible

likely is it the leaked documents show

but surveillance is a key tool in its
work to catch terrorists bugging
buildings and cars is something it's

ways to do that and they say to keep us

an incredibly damaging leak in terms of

BBC news
